description: Aspose.Imaging for .NET is an imaging library that lets developers create, edit, draw or convert images in their .NET applications. Aspose.Imaging provides features that go beyond the native capabilities of the development platform. It works independent of other applications and although Aspose.Imaging allows you to save to Adobe PhotoShop® format (PSD), you do not need PhotoShop on the machine.
releaseNotes:
New Features:
	
	IMAGING-33458		Add existing frames from different sources to a single TiffImage
	IMAGING-33153		Support large images
	
	Bug fixes:	

	IMAGING-33456		Support correct big endian tiff file format
	IMAGING-33438		Cannot retrieve palette for palletized tiff images
	IMAGING-33435		While converting Jpeg to Tiff with compression CCittfax4, resulting Tiff distorts
	IMAGING-33420		Simple save without conversion is not working for specific tiff images
	IMAGING-33411		Resize and LoadPixels does not work for the specific tiff images
	IMAGING-33408		Rotation of cached images is not correct
	IMAGING-33391		Support of Removing Tiff Frame
	IMAGING-33389		Support of Multipage Tiff
	IMAGING-33388		CCITTFAX4 Compression issue while converting JPG to TIFF
	IMAGING-33386		Tiff frame resize is incorrect
	IMAGING-33281		[Tiff] Tiff to JPEG conversion throwing ImageSaveException exception
	IMAGING-33279		[Tiff] RotateFlip method is malfunctioning
	IMAGING-33266		[Tiff] Exception arises upon editing tiff image
	IMAGING-33439		Support different bits count for palette tiff photometric
	IMAGING-33357		Issues when changing TiffOptions of a frame
	IMAGING-33481		Index out of range issue on adding a watermark to a Tiff
summary: Aspose.Imaging for .NET is an imaging library that lets developers create, edit, draw or convert images in their .NET applications. Aspose.Imaging provides features that go beyond the native capabilities of the development platform. It works independent of other applications and although Aspose.Imaging allows you to save to Adobe PhotoShop® format (PSD), you do not need PhotoShop on the machine.
title: Aspose.Imaging for .NET
